title: Stole, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk ribbons, glass beads, metal thread, and paillettes.
Technique: embroidered
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Ribbon of red silk with narrow borders in Persian cone design with ornaments of rosettes and, at either end, flowering stems, cross border and fringe worked in metal threads, foil, and paillettes. B similar to A, except for ribbon which is plain.
